# About me:
### Currently Linux admin
### Preferred products: GNU/Linux, OSX, Python, Vim, Git, Zsh
### Email - kernelfail@gmail.com
### Twitter - [kernelfail](https://twitter.com/kernelfail)

# Professional skills:
### Platforms: Debian/Ubuntu, RHEL/CentOS, openSUSE, FreeBSD
### Languages: Bash, Python(2/3), C/C++
### Databases: MySQL, FirebirdSQL, PostgreSQL
### Virtualization: Xen, VirtualBox, VmWare, KVM
### Version Control: Git, SVN
### Monitoring: Zabbix, Munin, Nagios
### Firewalls: iptables, pf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
